an5.197:4.1: “Mendicants, there these five obstacles to rain, which the readers of signs don’t know, and which their vision does not traverse.
an5.197:4.3: In the upper atmosphere the heat element flares up,
an5.197:4.5: This is the first obstacle to rain, which the readers of signs don’t know, and which their vision does not traverse.
an5.197:5.1: Furthermore, in the upper atmosphere the wind element flares up,
an5.197:5.3: This is the second obstacle to rain …
an5.197:6.1: Furthermore, Rāhu the lord of demons receives water in his hand and tosses it in the ocean.
an5.197:6.2: This is the third obstacle to rain …
an5.197:7.1: Furthermore, the gods of the rain clouds become negligent.
an5.197:7.2: This is the fourth obstacle to rain …
an5.197:8.2: This is the fifth obstacle to rain, which the readers of signs don’t know, and which their vision does not traverse.
an5.197:8.3: These are the five obstacles to rain, which the readers of signs don’t know, and which their vision does not traverse.”
